Name.label: Ectodermal dysplasia with natal teeth, Turnpenny type
Malformation syndrome with odontal and/or periodontal component
Genetic malformation syndrome with odontal and/or periodontal component

TextSection.Contents: A rare ectodermal dysplasia syndrome characterized by neonatal teeth, hypo- or oligodontia of the secondary dentition, flexural acanthosis nigricans, and sparse body and scalp hair (the latter being thin and slow-growing). There have been no further descriptions in the literature since 1995.

Name.label: E (exact mapping (the terms and the concepts are equivalent))
